column5: Live in the sunshine, swim in the sea! Spend your time splashing the day away in the private pool at tranquil Seahorse Condominiums. This beautiful gated complex is one block from the beach and offers private parking. Each unit is poolside, gas grills are available for guest use, outdoor shower to rinse off after playing in the sand, and washer/dryer inside the condo. This first floor 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit has 1 king bed, 1 queen bed, and a sofa sleeper to comfortably accommodate 6 guests.
column8: SEAHORSE CONDOS, #103 2 BD, 2 BTH, WALK TO BEACH
